p: NIC, SW, CR, and DFD designed this study. NIC and AB collected all data, and AB processed all soil samples. NIC conducted all analyses with substantial theoretical and practical suggestions by DFD, SW, and CR. NIC wrote the article with input and revisions by DFD, CR, SW, and AB All authors approved the final version. Our data and R code are freely available at the following Open Science Framework (OSF) site: https://osf.io/6pk3m/. These data are part of the OSF project “Anthropogenic disturbances in alpine ecosystems” ( https://doi.org/10.17605/osf.io/gkjv2).
